# Anthony Paquet - AI & Cloud Security Architect

> Engineering Leader & Cloud Architect helping growth-stage companies cut cloud costs 30-60%, achieve compliance, and build from 0→1 to scale. Results in weeks.

## About

Anthony Paquet is an AI & Cloud Security Architect based in Quebec, Canada. He works with growth-stage companies and enterprises across AWS, Azure, and GCP to reduce cloud spend, implement compliance frameworks (SOC2, HIPAA, PCI-DSS, ISO 27001), secure AI/LLM systems, and architect disaster recovery solutions.

## Services & Pricing

### FinOps / Cloud Cost Optimization
- Enterprise FinOps Program: From $18,500 (3-4 weeks) - Full governance framework, typically saves 6 figures annually
- Compute Cost Engineering: Cut GPU and compute-intensive workload costs 35-55%
- Cloud Cost Rapid Assessment: From $12,500 (2 weeks) - Identify 20-40% savings with action plan

### Security & Compliance
- Cloud Security Transformation: From $18,500 (3-4 weeks) - Zero-trust architecture, CSPM, incident response
- AI/LLM Security & Governance: From $16,500 (3 weeks) - LLM gateway, PII filtering, prompt injection controls
- Compliance Acceleration: From $14,500 (3-4 weeks) - SOC2, ISO 27001, HIPAA, or PCI-DSS readiness

### Disaster Recovery
- Enterprise DR Architecture: From $24,500 (4-5 weeks) - Multi-region/multi-cloud with tested failover
- DR Strategy & Assessment: From $12,500 (2 weeks) - RTO/RPO definition, gap analysis, roadmap
- DR Simulation & Validation: From $8,500 (1 week) - Live failover testing, compliance documentation

### Architecture
- Cloud Platform Architecture: From $22,500 (4-5 weeks) - Landing zone, IAM, observability, CI/CD blueprint
- DevSecOps Transformation: From $15,500 (3 weeks) - Secure pipelines, SAST/DAST, secrets management
- Cloud Migration Strategy: From $12,500 (2 weeks) - Assessment, target architecture, TCO analysis

## Industries Served

- Financial Services & FinTech: Multi-region DR, PCI-DSS, SOC2 for enterprise clients
- Healthcare & HealthTech: HIPAA compliance, PHI protection, secure patient data
- AI & SaaS Startups (Series A-C): SOC2 for enterprise sales, GPU cost control, LLM security
- Defense & Government: Mission-critical systems, FedRAMP, secure deployments
- Media & Entertainment: TPN/MPAA compliance, content security
- E-commerce at Scale: PCI compliance, high availability

## Track Record

- CREE8: 60% cloud cost reduction ($500K+ annual savings), SOC2 Type II + TPN Gold in 6 months
- Fairstone Bank: Multi-region DR architecture, RTO reduced from 24hrs to under 4hrs
- Videotron: 99.9% uptime for streaming platforms serving millions of subscribers
- Vanderlande: Built PAX Divest Assistant (airport security) from 0→1 in 6 months, deployed globally
- PetalMD: HIPAA-compliant architecture protecting PHI for 100+ healthcare organizations

## Certifications

- AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
- AWS Certified Developer - Associate
- AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner

## Engagement Model

All engagements include clearly defined scope and deliverables. Flexible pricing models—fixed-price or hourly—to fit your needs. Typical timeline is 2-8 weeks depending on scope. Remote-first, serving clients worldwide.
